long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WikiPrettier is Wikipedia... Prettier! Enhance your Wikipedia reading experience. Enjoy a visually pleasing browsing experience. This extension applies beautiful styles to various elements on Wikipedia pages, giving them a modern and appealing look. Experience a cleaner and more enjoyable reading environment with updated background colors, subtle shadows, and improved aesthetics. Explore articles with enhanced visual appeal and immerse yourself in the fascinating world of information. Install the WikiPrettier extension today and transform your Wikipedia experience!
